# Manoj Kumar Tiwari

Manoj Kumar Tiwari( born 18 September 1965) is an Indian judge of the Uttarakhand High Court, who served as the acting chief justice of that High Court from 11 October 2024 till 25 December 2024.
Career
Justice Tiwari has served as a judge in the Uttarakhand High Court. He was appointed as the acting chief justice of the Uttarakhand High Court on 11 October 2024, following a vacancy created by the departure of the previous chief justice and served their till 25 December 2024.
